title: Roborock S7 - Mop & Sensor Cleaning
summary: Cleaning the vibarise mop module and cliff sensors.
content:
Error 1 (Lidar blocked): Check the orange turret on top. Use a q-tip to spin the laser module gently. 

Mop Smell: Slide the mop cloth off. Wash in washing machine. Clean the water tank with a mild vinegar solution if calcified.
